Darkfate::

"It isnt a good idea let her leave the base... If we going to fight, 
we must call our troops before leave the base." said the Dragon "My 
troops will arrive soon"


--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> He still waited for a reply about Dark Mouse, so he dicided to go 
see
> her and Dollen. He got up and walked to the mess hall. When he 
arrived
> he sat with them.
> "I sent a comm message but I havn't gotten a reply."
> He opens a comm to Killfest.
> "We have a group of bots outside the volcano. They want Dark Mouse. 
We
> may have to enter combat. Stand by."
> 
> ::Dollen::
> 
> "What do they want with you, Dark Mouse?"
> 
> ::Demolition::
> 
> Demolition transformed to jet mode, and took off for Alliance 
island.
> He needed repairs.
